EmailTemplate.description: sent for strategy review selected need to send information
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity Proposal Waiting Government Sub-K Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Government Sub Contract assigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Government Sub Contract Specialist,
You have been assigned a Government Sub Contract number {!Opportunity_Proposal_Waiting__c.Name}. Please log on to sales force to view the details and take the appropriate actions.
Thank you.
